scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && yarn run build" "cd api && yarn run build"
scripts.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; export NODE_ENV=; NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false NODE_ENV=development npm install --only=dev --dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: yarn run build; export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=true; export NODE_ENV=production;
scripts.install: (cd client && yarn install) && (cd api && yarn install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd api && PORT=3001 yarn start"
scripts.start:win: concurrently "cd client && set PORT=3000 && yarn start" "cd api && set PORT=3001 && yarn start"
